TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IdnMapping extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持 Internet 域名使用非 ASCII 字符。

span.span: Supports the use of non-ASCII characters for Internet domain names.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Internet 域名包含名为域名标签，由标签分隔符分隔的一个或多个部分。An Internet domain name consists of one or more parts, called domain name labels, separated by label separators. 例如，域名称"www.proseware.com"包含标签、"www"、"proseware"和"com"，用句点分隔的。For example, the domain name "www.proseware.com" consists of the labels, "www", "proseware", and "com", separated by periods. 标准域名包含 US ASCII （或基本拉丁文） 字符范围，从 u+0021 到 U + 007E 中的指定字符。Standard domain names consist of designated characters in the US-ASCII (or Basic Latin) character range, from U+0021 to U+007E. 为了便于在不使用 US ASCII 字符集的域名中的应用程序 (IDNA) 的区域性中的 Internet 使用标准已采用 2003 来支持包含 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的 Unicode 字符。To facilitate Internet usage in cultures that do not use the US-ASCII character set, the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) standard was adopted in 2003 to support the inclusion of Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range. 但是，名称服务器和域名解析仍依赖于 US-ASCII 字符范围内的字符。However, name servers and domain name resolution continue to rely on characters within the US-ASCII character range. IDNA 机制使用 Punycode 映射国际化的域名包含 US-ASCII 字符范围到域名系统支持的 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的 Unicode 字符。The IDNA mechanism uses Punycode to map an internationalized domain name that contains Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to the US-ASCII character range supported by the domain name system. IDNA 机制用于仅将域名转换，不在 Internet 上传输的数据。The IDNA mechanism is used to convert only domain names, not data transmitted over the Internet. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则类支持基于 IDNA 标准，具体取决于正在使用的操作系统的不同版本：In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use: > > - 运行时[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支持基于 IDNA 标准中所述的 2008年版本[RFC 5891： 国际化域名中的应用程序 (IDNA): 协议](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > - 当早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上运行，它支持 2003年版本的中所述的标准[RFC 3490： 国际化域名中的应用程序 (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110). > > 请参阅[Unicode 技术标准 #46: IDNA 兼容性处理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)这些标准的差异的方式处理某一组字符。See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters. 方法规范化的域名，将规范化的名称转换为包含 US ASCII 码位范围 (U + 0020 至 U + 007E)，可显示 Unicode 字符和前面添加一个 ASCII 兼容编码 (ACE) 前缀的表示形式 ("xn-") 向每个标签。The method normalizes a domain name, converts the normalized name to a representation that consists of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII code point range (U+0020 to U+007E), and prepends an ASCII-compatible encoding (ACE) prefix ("xn--") to each label. 方法将还原由转换的域名标签方法。The method restores the domain name labels converted by the method. 如果要转换的字符串中包含标签分隔符字符象形完全停止 (U + 3002)，全角完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和形字句 (U + FF61)方法将其转换为标签分隔符完全停止 （句点，U +002E)。If the string to be converted includes the label separator characters IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61), the method converts them to the label separator FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 方法，但是，不会还原原始标签分隔符字符。The method, however, does not restore the original label separator character. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将数组转换为国际化域名到 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 方法然后转换的 Punycode 域名返回到原始域名，但用标准标签分隔符替换原始标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back to the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共方法都是线程安全的可能从多个线程，只要同时使用实例的属性也设置不同时。

span.span: All public methods of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, as long as the instance's properties are not also set concurrently.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并属性初始化为`false`。The and properties are initialized to `false`. ASCII 字符 A-Z、 0-9、 连字符 （-） 之外的一小部分字符 (U + 002D)，和句点 （.） 字符允许在域的名称，但不是未分配的 Unicode 码位。A small subset of ASCII characters other than A-Z, 0-9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character are permitted in domain names, but unassigned Unicode code points are not.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool AllowUnassigned { get; set; }
.property instance bool AllowUnassigned
Public Property AllowUnassigned As Boolean
public: property bool AllowUnassigned { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowUnassigned : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前 对象的成员所执行的操作中是否使用未分配的 Unicode 码位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unassigned Unicode code points are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果在操作中使用未分配的码位，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unassigned code points are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已注册的域名不能包含未分配的码位。A registered domain name cannot contain unassigned code points. 因此，默认值属性是`false`。Consequently, the default value of the property is `false`. IDNA 规范匹配的字符串的查询中仅允许未分配的码位 (即，在域的名称查找)。The IDNA specification permits unassigned code points only in queries for matching strings (that is, in domain name lookup). 未分配的码位域的名称中使用的详细信息，请参阅[RFC 3454、"准备的国际化字符串 (stringprep)"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873)和[RFC 5891、"国际化域名在应用程序 （IDNA): 协议"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。For more information about the use of unassigned code points in domain names, see [RFC 3454, "Preparation of Internationalized Strings (stringprep)"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) and [RFC 5891, "Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol"](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875). > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果属性是`false`，与属性关联的行为取决于基础操作系统上。If the property is `false`, the behavior associated with the property depends on the underlying operating system. 上[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，则类符合 IDNA 2008，基于 Unicode 6.0 的标准。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], the class conforms to IDNA 2008, which is based on the Unicode 6.0 standard. 在以前版本的 Windows，类，根据 IDNA 2003 年，Unicode 3 为基础。*x*。On previous versions of Windows, the class is based on IDNA 2003, which is based on Unicode 3.*x*. 已在 IDNA 2003 未分配的码位分配了字符和 IDNA 2008 支持。Some code points that were unassigned in IDNA 2003 have been assigned characters and are supported in IDNA 2008. 例如，U + 0221年是在 Unicode 4.0 中引入的。For example, U+0221 was introduced in Unicode 4.0. 在[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，编码为"xn — 6la"。On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it is encoded as "xn—6la". 在以前版本的 Windows，则会引发异常。On previous versions of Windows, it throws an exception.

summary.span: 将包含 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的Unicode字符的域名称标签字符串编码为（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符的字符串。

span.span: Encodes a string of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E).

summary.span: 根据 IDNA 标准格式化的字符串。

span.span: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode);
member this.GetAscii : string -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要转换的字符串，它包含一个或多个由标签分隔符分隔的域名标签。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

summary.span: 将由 Unicode 字符组成的域名标签的字符串编码为 US-ASCII 字符范围内的可显示的 Unicode 字符的字符串。

span.span: Encodes a string of domain name labels that consist of Unicode characters to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 根据 IDNA 标准格式化的字符串。

span.span: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 参数指定的字符串的等效项包括 US-ASCII 字符范围（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the string specified by the parameter, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`参数指定有效的 Unicode 字符组成的一个或多个标签的字符串。The `unicode` parameter specifies a string of one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 标签由标签分隔符分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. `unicode`参数不能以开头的标签分隔符，但它可以包括并根据需要以分隔符结尾。The `unicode` parameter cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 标签分隔符是完全停止 (时间段，U + 002E)、 表意字符完全停止 (U + 3002)，全角完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和形字句 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，域名称"www.adatum.com"包含标签、"www"、"adatum"和"com"，用句点分隔的。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 标签不能包含任何以下字符：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 从 U + U + 001F 和 U + 007F 0001 Unicode 控制字符。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 如果未分配 Unicode 字符的值属性是`false`。Unassigned Unicode characters, if the value of the property is `false`. - 非标准字符在 US-ASCII 字符范围，例如空间 (U + 0020)，感叹号标记 (U + 0021)，和如果低行 (U + 005F) 字符的值属性是`true`。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, if the value of the property is `true`. - 禁止的特定版本的基于 IDNA 标准的字符。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 有关禁用的字符的详细信息，请参阅[RFC 3454： 准备的国际化字符串 ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 码位和国际化域名应用程序](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法将所有标签分隔符都转换为完全停止 (时间段，U + 002E)。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果`unicode`不包含任何字符之外的 US-ASCII 字符范围和 US-ASCII 字符范围内的任何字符禁止的该方法返回`unicode`不变。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将数组转换为国际化域名到 punycode 编码，这是在 US-ASCII 字符范围的字符组成的编码等效项。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 方法然后转换为 Punycode 域名返回原始域名，但用标准标签分隔符替换原始标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/cs/conversion1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.class/vb/conversion1.vb#1)]

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

para.span: 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则类支持基于 IDNA 标准，具体取决于正在使用的操作系统的不同版本：

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:

para.span: 的上运行时间[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支持基于 IDNA 标准中所述的 2008年版本[RFC 5891： 国际化域名中的应用程序 (IDNA): 协议](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

span.span: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).

para.span: -当早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上运行，它支持 2003年版本的中所述的标准[RFC 3490： 国际化域名中的应用程序 (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

span.span: - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).

para.span: 请参阅[Unicode 技术标准 #46: IDNA 兼容性处理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)这些标准的差异的方式处理某一组字符。

span.span: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode, int32 index) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String, index As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode, int index);
member this.GetAscii : string * int -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要转换的字符串，它包含一个或多个由标签分隔符分隔的域名标签。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

param.name: index
param.span: unicode 的从零开始的偏移量，用于指定开始转换的子字符串起始位置。

span.span: A zero-based offset into unicode that specifies the start of the substring to convert.

param.span: 转换运算将继续执行到 unicode 字符串的末尾。

span.span: The conversion operation continues to the end of the unicode string.

summary.span: 编码包含US-ASCII字符范围以外的 Unicode 字符的域名称标签子字符串。

span.span: Encodes a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 子串转换为在 US-ASCII 字符范围内可显示的“ Unicode ”字符串并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 和 指定的子字符串的等效项包括 US-ASCII 字符范围（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `unicode`和`index`参数定义使用有效的 Unicode 字符组成的一个或多个标签的子字符串。The `unicode` and `index` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 标签由标签分隔符分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字符串的第一个字符不能以开头的标签分隔符，但它可以包括并根据需要以分隔符结尾。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 标签分隔符是完全停止 (时间段，U + 002E)、 表意字符完全停止 (U + 3002)，全角完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和形字句 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，域名称"www.adatum.com"包含标签、"www"、"adatum"和"com"，用句点分隔的。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 标签不能包含任何以下字符：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 从 U + U + 001F 和 U + 007F 0001 Unicode 控制字符。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未分配的 Unicode 字符，具体取决于值属性。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - 非标准字符在 US-ASCII 字符范围，例如空间 (U + 0020)、 感叹号标记 (U + 0021)，和低行 (U + 005F) 字符，具体取决于值属性。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - 禁止的特定版本的基于 IDNA 标准的字符。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 有关禁用的字符的详细信息，请参阅[RFC 3454： 准备的国际化字符串 ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 码位和国际化域名应用程序](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法将所有标签分隔符都转换为完全停止 (时间段，U + 002E)。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果`unicode`不包含任何字符之外的 US-ASCII 字符范围和 US-ASCII 字符范围内的任何字符禁止的该方法返回`unicode`不变。If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged. ## Examples 以下示例将删除本地部分和 @ 从电子邮件地址，并将传递字符生成的域命名为方法来创建 Punycode 域名，这是在 US ASCII 字符组成的编码等效项字符范围。The following example removes the local part and the @ character from an email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the method to create a Punycode domain name, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 方法然后转换为 Punycode 域名返回原始域名，但用标准标签分隔符替换原始标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1a.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1a.vb#2)]

exception.span: 根据 和 属性以及 IDNA 标准， 是无效的。

span.span: is invalid based on the and properties, and the IDNA standard.

para.span: 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，则类支持基于 IDNA 标准，具体取决于正在使用的操作系统的不同版本：

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:

para.span: 的上运行时间[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支持基于 IDNA 标准中所述的 2008年版本[RFC 5891： 国际化域名中的应用程序 (IDNA): 协议](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

span.span: - When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).

para.span: -当早期版本的 Windows 操作系统上运行，它支持 2003年版本的中所述的标准[RFC 3490： 国际化域名中的应用程序 (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

span.span: - When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).

para.span: 请参阅[Unicode 技术标准 #46: IDNA 兼容性处理](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)这些标准的差异的方式处理某一组字符。

span.span: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAscii (string unicode, int index, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance string GetAscii(string unicode, int32 index, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function GetAscii (unicode As String, index As Integer, count As Integer) As String
public: System::String ^ GetAscii(System::String ^ unicode, int index, int count);
member this.GetAscii : string * int * int -> string

param.name: unicode
param.span: 要转换的字符串，它包含一个或多个由标签分隔符分隔的域名标签。

span.span: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.

param.name: index
param.span: unicode 的从零开始的偏移量，用于指定子字符串的起始位置。

span.span: A zero-based offset into unicode that specifies the start of the substring.

param.name: count
param.span: 要在 unicode 字符串中的 index 指定的位置开始的子字符串中转换的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters to convert in the substring that starts at the position specified by index in the unicode string.

summary.span: 编码包含 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的 Unicode 字符的域名称标签子字符串的指定字符数。

span.span: Encodes the specified number of characters in a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.

summary.span: 子串转换为在 US-ASCII 字符范围内可显示的“ Unicode ”字符串并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.

returns.span: 由 、 和 参数指定的子字符串的等效项，包括 US-ASCII 字符范围（U+0020 至 U+007E）内的可显示 Unicode 字符并根据 IDNA 标准格式化。

span.span: The equivalent of the substring specified by the , , and parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Unicode`， `index`，和`count`参数定义使用有效的 Unicode 字符组成的一个或多个标签的子字符串。The `Unicode`, `index`, and `count` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters. 标签由标签分隔符分隔。The labels are separated by label separators. 子字符串的第一个字符不能以开头的标签分隔符，但它可以包括并根据需要以分隔符结尾。The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator. 标签分隔符是完全停止 (时间段，U + 002E)、 表意字符完全停止 (U + 3002)，全角完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和形字句 (U + FF61)。The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61). 例如，域名称"www.adatum.com"包含标签、"www"、"adatum"和"com"，用句点分隔的。For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods. 标签不能包含任何以下字符：A label cannot contain any of the following characters: - 从 U + U + 001F 和 U + 007F 0001 Unicode 控制字符。Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F. - 未分配的 Unicode 字符，具体取决于值属性。Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the property. - 非标准字符在 US-ASCII 字符范围，例如空间 (U + 0020)、 感叹号标记 (U + 0021)，和低行 (U + 005F) 字符，具体取决于值属性。Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the property. - 禁止的特定版本的基于 IDNA 标准的字符。Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard. 有关禁用的字符的详细信息，请参阅[RFC 3454： 准备的国际化字符串 ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 码位和国际化域名应用程序](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008. 方法将所有标签分隔符都转换为完全停止 (时间段，U + 002E)。The method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E). 如果子字符串包含 US-ASCII 字符范围以外的任何字符，并且不禁止使用 US-ASCII 字符范围内的任何字符，该方法返回未更改的子字符串。If the substring contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range, and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns the substring unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将转换为符合 IDNA 标准的域名的国际化的域名。The following example uses the method to convert an internationalized domain name to a domain name that complies with the IDNA standard. 方法然后标准化的域名会将转换回原始域名，但用标准标签分隔符替换原始标签分隔符。The method then converts the standardized domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. [!code-csharp[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/CS/getx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IdnMapping.GetX#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IdnMapping.GetX/VB/getx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int GetHashCode ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer
public: override int GetHashCode();
override this.GetHashCode : unit -> int

summary.span: 返回此 对象的哈希代码。

span.span: Returns a hash code for this object.

returns.span: 从 对象的属性派生的四个 32 位常量中的一个。

span.span: One of four 32-bit signed constants derived from the properties of an object.

returns.span: 返回值没有特殊意义，不适合在哈希代码算法中使用。

span.span: The return value has no special meaning and is not suitable for use in a hash code algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法如果你的应用程序需要实现一种有意义的哈希代码算法。Override the method if your application needs to implement a meaningful hash code algorithm. ## Examples 下面的示例假定一个字符串可以包含多个由空格分隔的电子邮件地址。The following example assumes that a single string can contain multiple email addresses separated by spaces. 它会删除本地部分和生成的域命名的 @ 字符从每个电子邮件地址，并传递或方法来创建 Punycode 域名。It removes the local part and the @ character from each email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the or method to create a Punycode domain name. 方法然后转换回原始域名的 Punycode 域名。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/cs/conversion1b.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.getascii/vb/conversion1b.vb#3)]

summary.span: 对基于 IDNA 标准编码为 Unicode 字符串的一个或多个域名标签进行解码。

span.span: Decodes one or more domain name labels encoded according to the IDNA standard to a string of Unicode characters.

Public Function GetUnicode (ascii As String) As String
public: System::String ^ GetUnicode(System::String ^ ascii);

param.name: ascii
param.span: 要解码的字符串，包含根据 IDNA 标准在 US-ASCII 字符范围 （U+0020 至 U+007E） 编码的一个或多个标签。

span.span: The string to decode, which consists of one or more labels in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) encoded according to the IDNA standard.

summary.span: 对基于 IDNA 标准编码的一个或者多个域名标签的字符串进行解码，解码为一个 Unicode 字符串。

span.span: Decodes a string of one or more domain name labels, encoded according to the IDNA standard, to a string of Unicode characters.

returns.span: 由 参数指定的 IDNA 子字符串的 Unicode 等效项。

span.span: The Unicode equivalent of the IDNA substring specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关域的名称、 标签和标签分隔符的详细信息，请参阅备注方法。For more information about domain names, labels, and label separators, see the remarks for the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将数组转换为国际化域名到 Punycode。The following example uses the method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode. 方法然后转换为 Punycode 域名返回原始域名，但用标准标签分隔符替换原始标签分隔符。The method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator. MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseStd3AsciiRules { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseStd3AsciiRules
Public Property UseStd3AsciiRules As Boolean
public: property bool UseStd3AsciiRules { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseStd3AsciiRules : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在当前 对象的成员所执行的操作中是使用标准命名约定还是宽松命名约定。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether standard or relaxed naming conventions are used in operations performed by members of the current object.

value.span: 如果在操作中使用标准命名转换，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if standard naming conventions are used in operations; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遵循标准的命名规则的域名包含 US-ASCII 字符范围中的字符的特定子集。Domain names that follow standard naming rules consist of a specific subset of characters in the US-ASCII character range. 字符是字母 A 到 Z、 数字 0-9、 连字符 （-） 字符 (U + 002D) 和句点 （.） 字符。The characters are the letters A through Z, the digits 0 through 9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character. 字符的大小写并不重要。The case of the characters is not significant. 宽松命名约定允许使用更广泛的 ASCII 字符，包括空格字符 (U + 0020)、 感叹号字符 (U + 0021)，和的下划线字符 (U + 005F)。Relaxed naming conventions allow the use of a broader range of ASCII characters, including the space character (U+0020), the exclamation point character (U+0021), and the underbar character (U+005F). 如果是`true`，只有标准字符可以出现在由返回的标签方法。If is `true`, only standard characters can appear in a label returned by the method. 默认情况下的值属性是`false`，并在标签中允许使用扩展的 ASCII 字符的子集。By default, the value of the property is `false`, and an expanded subset of ASCII characters is permitted in a label. > [!NOTE] > 类禁止不可字符 u+0000 到 U + 001F，使用和 U + 007F 中的域名标签而不考虑的设置属性。The class prohibits the use of the nondisplayable characters U+0000 through U+001F, and U+007F in domain name labels regardless of the setting of the property. 此禁止降低安全攻击等名称欺骗攻击的风险。This prohibition reduces the risk of security attacks such as name spoofing. ## Examples 下面的示例生成包含从 u+0000 到 U + 007F 的 ASCII 范围中的字符的 Url，并将它们传递到方法的两个对象。The following example generates URLs that contain characters in the ASCII range from U+0000 to U+007F and passes them to the method of two objects. 一个对象具有其属性设置为`true`，和另一个对象已将其设置为`false`。One object has its property set to `true`, and the other object has it set to `false`. 输出会显示是无效的字符属性是`true`时才是有效但`false`。The output displays the characters that are invalid when the property is `true` but valid when it is `false`. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/cs/usestd3asciirules1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.idnmapping.usestd3asciirules/vb/usestd3asciirules1.vb#1)]
